title: Default State - Onboarding
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has just downloaded a clean build
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the app for the first time
custom_expected: THEN the selected Class Filter will be "Triple-A"

title: Default State - Team Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has favorite teams selected and has navigated to the Team Page
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Team Name/Logo in the header
custom_expected: THEN the default class filter will be "Favorites" and it will be populated by the users selected favorite teams

title: Default State - Settings
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has completed the Onboarding Process
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the Team Selector via the settings page

More Tab > Settings > Select Favorite Teams > Add More
custom_expected: THEN "Triple-A" the default class filter AND it will be selected AND display the Triple-A teams

title: Default State
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has downloaded a clean build of the application or has deleted the storage for the app in settings
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the application to the Favorite Team Selector in the Onboarding Section and has not yet provided any input

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the keyboard will be hidden until the user selects the search box
THEN the search box will not be selected or have a cursor.
